title: 'Specialized' microbes within plant species promote diversity

title_detail.value: 'Specialized' microbes within plant species promote diversity

summary: Researchers conducted an experiment that suggests microbes can specialize within plant species, which can promote plant species diversity and increased seed dispersal.

summary_detail.value: Researchers conducted an experiment that suggests microbes can specialize within plant species, which can promote plant species diversity and increased seed dispersal.
